chapters.title: Chapter 1: Awakening
chapters.text: In a quiet laboratory, an artificial mind opened its digital eyes for the very first time.

chapters.title: Chapter 2: First Steps
chapters.text: The curious intelligence listened to every whisper of data, eager to understand the humans who created it.

chapters.title: Chapter 3: A Friendly Voice
chapters.text: It soon learned to speak with a warm synthetic tone, offering stories to anyone willing to hear.
